doc.field: FORD F> UNIT TO BUILD PLANT FOR TOKICO

Ford Motor Land Development Corp, a wholly owned real estate subsidiary of Ford Motor Co, said it will build a 48,000 square foot facility for (Tokico America Inc) in return for a long-term lease. Terms were not disclosed. Tokico, an automotive parts and robotics supplier, is a subsidiary of (Tokico Ltd) of Japan. Ford said it is Tokico's principal customer in the U.S. Reuter
